description: Dashboard that graphs metrics exported via statsd plugin and prometheus statsd_exporter in Kong (http://github.com/kong/kong)

panels.title: API Count per Service per Consumer
RPS per service by status code
RPS per workspace by status code

targets.expr: sum(rate(kong_statsd_status_per_route_per_consumer{service=~"$service", instance=~"$instance", consumer=~"$consumer", route=~"$route"}[1m])) by (service,code, consumer, route)

panels.title: RPS per consumer/route by status code
Kong Proxy Latency across all services
Kong shared memory usage by Node ($instance)

title: Kong StatsD exporter
